title: Enabling one tied target feature with `-Ctarget-features` silently enables them all

labels.name: A-target-feature
labels.description: Area: Enabling/disabling target features like AVX, Neon, etc.

body:
<!--
Thank you for filing a bug report! 🐛 Please provide a short summary of the bug,
along with any information you feel relevant to replicating the bug.
-->

I tried this code: https://rust.godbolt.org/z/bKdTe4rGb

```rust
#[cfg(target_feature = "pacg")]
compile_error!{ "pacg enabled" }
```

I expected to see this happen: with `-Ctarget-feature=+paca` I expect either an error requiring `pacg` to be enabled with `paca`, or some other diagnostic

Instead, this happened: `pacg` is silently enabled and the compile error is triggered. See also https://github.com/rust-lang/stdarch/issues/1352#issuecomment-1322067194
